creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: bottom of image is dark with silhouettes of man plowing with two oxen at right; clouds at left partially obscure setting sun; mounted on board
dimension: 15 3/8 x 19 1/8 in. (39.05 x 48.58 cm) (image, sheet, mount)
inscription:
Inscription, Stamp and Label

on back, in black ink: [PLOWING AT SUNSET / (BETANZOS, BOLIVIA)]
markings: on back, stamped in black: [TOM STACK & ASSOCIATES / 1638 FARWELL AVE.  APT. 3B / CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60626]; on back: photographer\'s address label
title: Plowing at Sunset, Betanzos, Bolivia
